name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bing Webmaster Tools Bulk URL Remover

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free tool to automate removal of URLs in bulk on Bing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Bing Webmaster Tools Bulk URL Remover Extension, an efficient tool that makes managing your Bing search results a breeze. This Chrome extension is carefully crafted for webmasters, SEO professionals and anyone seeking to maintain a organized presence. It simplifies the task of tidying up updating and streamlining your URLs in the Bing Webmaster Tools Console.

FAQ (Please, read if you have a problem with the extension):
!!! Please, make sure to refresh the page before executing the extension !!!

1. Where should the extension be opened and run?
- On the removals page of Bing Webmaster Tools (https://www.bing.com/webmasters/searchconfig/blockurl);

2. How should I separate the links?
- The links should be separated by a new line (Enter).

3. What language my browser should be set to?
- On the current version of the extension, your browser and the page are required to be set to "English" as the logic of the extension depends on it.
